fields.name: gpt_name
fields.description: The name or title of the custom GPT.

fields.name: category
fields.description: The main category under which the GPT falls, e.g., Art & Design, Business & Finance.

fields.name: subcategory
fields.description: The specific subcategory for more granular classification, e.g., Graphic Design, Investing.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the custom GPT's purpose and functionality.

fields.name: created_date
fields.description: The date when the custom GPT was created.

fields.name: last_modified_date
fields.description: The date when the custom GPT was last modified or updated.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current status of the custom GPT, e.g., Active, Inactive, Archived.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version number of the custom GPT, indicating updates or revisions.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: An array of tags or keywords associated with the custom GPT for easy searching and filtering.

fields.name: author
fields.description: The name of the person or team who created the custom GPT.
